translation.key: {str:Victim} has been muted for {sec:Duration} ({str:Reason})
translation.value: {str:Victim} 因为 ({str:Reason}) 被禁言{sec:Duration}

translation.key: You are now logged.
translation.value: 你现在登录了

translation.key: Wrong username/password.
translation.value: 错误的用户名或密码

translation.key: An error occured during the operation.
translation.value: 一个错误出现在此操作过程中

translation.key: You must be logged for this operation
translation.value: 你必须登录才能使用这个操作

translation.key: Please wait 5 minutes before creating another account
translation.value: 请等待5分钟再创建其他账号

translation.key: An error occured during the creation of your account.
translation.value: 一个错误出现在创建账号的过程中

translation.key: This username is already taken by an existing account
translation.value: 这个用户名已经有了一个账号

translation.key: Your account has been created and you are now logged.
translation.value: 你的账号现在被创建了并且你已经登录账号

translation.key: You must be logged to see your rank
translation.value: 你必须登录才能看到你的排行榜

translation.key: You must be logged to see your goal
translation.value: 你必须登录才能看到你的目标

translation.key: You have already notified that {str:PlayerName} ought to be banned
translation.value: 你已经提议封禁 {str:PlayerName}

translation.key: {str:PlayerName} wants {str:VictimName} to be banned ({str:Reason})
translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 想要封禁 {str:VictimName} ({str:Reason})

translation.key: {str:VictimName} has been infected
translation.value: {str:VictimName} 被感染了

translation.key: Infected won the round in {sec:RoundDuration}
translation.value: 感染在{sec:RoundDuration}内赢了这轮

translation.key: {int:NumHumans} humans won the round
You have survived, +5 points
translation.value: 你活了下来, +5分

translation.key: You have infected {str:VictimName}, +3 points
translation.value: 你感染了{str:VictimName}, +3分

translation.key: You have killed a witch, +5 points
translation.value: 你杀死了一个女巫, +5分

translation.key: You have killed a freezer, +3 points
translation.value: 你杀死了一个冰冻者, +3分

translation.key: You have eliminated your target, +2 points
translation.value: 你刺杀了你的目标, +2分

translation.key: Hook protection enabled
translation.value: 钩索保护开启

translation.key: Hook protection disabled
translation.value: 钩索保护关闭

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 被封禁 ({str:Reason})

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 被踢出 ({str:Reason})

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 离开了游戏 ({str:Reason})

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 离开了游戏

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 加入了旁观

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 加入了游戏

translation.key: You are a human: {str:ClassName}
translation.value: 你是一名人类: {str:ClassName}

translation.key: You are an infected: {str:ClassName}
translation.value: 你被感染了: {str:ClassName}

translation.key: {str:PlayerName} entered and joined the game
translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 进入服务器并加入游戏

translation.key: You are muted for {sec:Duration}
translation.value: 你被禁言{sec:Duration}

translation.key: You can't join the spectators right now
translation.value: 你现在不能加入旁观者

translation.key: {str:PlayerName} changed their name to {str:NewName}
translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 修改了他的名字为 {str:NewName}

translation.key: Switch language to english ?
translation.value: 切换你的语言为中文?

translation.key: You can change the language of this mod using the command /language.
translation.value: 你可以在这个模式使用 /language 来修改语言

translation.key: If your language is not available, you can help with translation (/help translate).
translation.value: 如果你的语言不存在,你可以帮助我们翻译 (输入 /help translate).

translation.key: InfectionClassChinaRank, by ErrorDreemurr
translation.value: InfectionClassChallengeRank 模组由 ErrorDreemurr 制作

translation.key:
Open source on 
github.com/TeeDreamStudio/teeworlds-infclassCR
translation.value:
开源在
github.com/TeeDreamStudio/teeworlds-infclassCR

translation.key: Based on the concept of InfectionClass mod by necropotame
translation.value: 源自 necropotame 所做的 InfectionClass mod

translation.key: Main contributors: {str:ListOfContributors}
translation.value: 主要贡献者: {str:ListOfContributors}

translation.key:
Thanks to
 {str:ListOfContributors}
translation.value:
感谢:
 {str:ListOfContributors}

translation.key: Server version from {str:ServerCompileDate}
translation.value: 服务器构建版本: {str:ServerCompileDate}

translation.key: No player was found with this name
translation.value: 没有任何一个玩家叫这个名字

translation.key: Rules of the game
translation.value: 游戏规则

translation.key: InfectionClass is a team game between humans and infected.
translation.value: 感染模式是一个人类与感染间的团队游戏.

translation.key: All players start as human.
translation.value: 所有玩家最初都是人类.

translation.key: 10 seconds later, two players become infected.
translation.value: 10 秒后,几名人类会被感染.

translation.key: The goal for humans is to survive until the army cleans the map.
translation.value: 人类的目标就是活到救援清理地图.

translation.key: The goal for infected is to infect all humans.
translation.value: 感染者的目标是感染所有人类

translation.key: The Engineer can build walls with his hammer to block infected.
translation.value: 工程师可以用锤子建造激光墙来阻挡感染者

translation.key: When an infected touches the wall, he dies.
translation.value: 如果一个感染碰到激光墙便会死亡

translation.key: The lifespan of a wall is {sec:LifeSpan} and walls are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: 激光墙的存在时间为 {sec:LifeSpan} 以及同一玩家同一时间最多只能有一个激光墙

translation.key: The Soldier can pose floating bombs with his hammer.
translation.value: 士兵可以用锤子布置悬浮的炸弹

translation.key: Bomb default can explode {int:NumBombs} times.
translation.value: 炸弹默认可以爆炸 {int:NumBombs}次

translation.key: Use the hammer to place the bombs and explode each with one click.
translation.value: 使用锤子可以布置炸弹并引爆炸弹中的其中一个

translation.key: The bombs can use grenades to add.
translation.value: 炸弹可以通过榴弹炮来添加

translation.key: Bombs are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: 在同一时间内同一玩家最多只能有一处炸弹

translation.key: The Scientist can pose floating mines with his hammer.
translation.value: 科学家可以布置悬浮的地雷

translation.key: Mines are limited to {int:NumMines} per player at the same time.
translation.other: 同一时间内同一玩家最多只能布置 {int:NumMines}个地雷

translation.key: He has also grenades that teleport him.
translation.value: 他也可以用榴弹炮来传送自己

translation.key: Additionally he can place white holes with the laser rifle. Further information on /help whitehole
translation.value: 此外, 他可以用激光墙安放白洞, 关于白洞的信息可以查看/help whitehole

translation.key: The Sciogist can pose floating anti-airmines with his hammer.
translation.value: 融合学家可以使用他的锤子安置防空地雷

translation.key: Mine is limited 1 per player at the same time
translation.value: 同一时间内同一玩家最多只能布置1个防空地雷

translation.key: He also has fire 3 time grenades . And he has a shotgun with bouncing bullets
translation.value: 他也拥有3重榴弹 . 他可以使用猎枪击退感染者

translation.key:
Additionally he can place elastic holes with the grenades.
 that explode will damage anything.
translation.value:
此外,他可以通过榴弹放置弹射洞.
弹射洞爆炸会对所有人造成伤害.

translation.key: The Catapult can use elastic grenades.
translation.value: 弹射者可以使用弹射榴弹炮.

translation.key: He also has a laser-rifle that can fire a elastic entity.
translation.value: 他还可以使用激光枪来发射一个弹射体,

translation.key: If elatic entity collide wall, floor
translation.value: 如果弹射体碰到墙壁，地板

translation.key: It will bounce back and explode. Then repeat the loop until it disappears.
translation.value: 它会反弹并产生爆炸. 然后重复循环直到消失.

translation.key: If elastic entity disappeared. its will create many laser and explode.
translation.value: 如果弹射体消失了.它将会产生许多激光并且产生爆炸.

translation.key: The Police can use hammer to use shield.
translation.value: 警察可以使用锤子来触发盾牌.

translation.key: The shield can switch mode with the hammer.
translation.value: 盾牌可以通过锤子切换模式.

translation.key: He also has a laser-rifle that can freeze zombies.
translation.value: 他还有一把激光枪，可以冻结僵尸.

translation.key: And he has a gun, damage is very high.But ammo is scarce
translation.value: 他还有一把手枪, 伤害很高, 但是弹药量很少.

translation.key: The Reviver can protect humans with his hammer by giving them health.But can't heal heroes and medics.
translation.value: 归命师可以用锤子治疗人类，给予他们血量.但是不能治疗英雄和医疗兵.

translation.key: And he has a grenades that hinder infected from harming and make them slower.
translation.value: 以及他有榴弹炮可以让感染者暂时无法造成伤害,并使他们减慢速度.

translation.key: The Biologist has a shotgun with bouncing bullets and can create a flower-like-laser-trap by shooting with his rifle.
translation.value: 生物学家拥有一把猎枪可以射出会反弹的子弹, 并且他可以用激光创建像花朵一样的激光地雷.

translation.key: The Looper has a laser wall that slows down zombies and a fast shooting low-range-laser-rifle.
translation.value: 循环者拥有激光墙，它可以降低僵尸的移动速度，以及一柄快速射击的低范围激光枪.

translation.key: He also has a grenades.
translation.value: 他还有一柄榴弹炮.

translation.key: The Medic can protect humans with his hammer by giving them armor.
translation.value: 医疗兵可以用锤子给人类盾牌来保护人类

translation.key: Grenades with medicine give armor to everybody in their range, including heroes and medic themself
translation.value: 医疗兵的榴弹可以给予附近的人类盾牌, 包括英雄和医疗兵.

translation.key: Laser revives infected zombies, but at great cost - 17 hp and armor.
translation.value: 激光可以治疗感染者, 但是会损失17点血量加盾牌.

translation.key: He has also a powerful shotgun that can pullback infected.
translation.value: 他还拥有超棒的猎枪可以击退感染

translation.key: The Hero has a shotgun, a laser rifle and grenades.
translation.value: 英雄拥有猎枪, 激光枪和榴弹炮.

translation.key: The Hero can find a flag on the map which is only visible to himself.
translation.value: 英雄可以在地图上找到只有他自己才能看到的旗帜.

translation.key: Once taken, the flag gives 1 health point, 4 armor points, and full ammo to all humans, furthermore full health and armor to the hero.
translation.value: 一旦找到旗帜, 会给予所有人类1点血量和4点盾牌, 与全满的弹药, 也会给英雄的血量与护甲增满.

translation.key: The hero cannot be healed by a medic, but he can withstand a thrust by an infected, an his health suffice.
translation.value: 英雄不能被医疗兵治疗, 但是他可以在满盾情况下抵挡一次感染者的致命攻击.

translation.key: The Ninja can throw flash grenades that can freeze infected for three seconds.
translation.value: 忍者可以投掷闪光弹来冻结感染者3秒

translation.key: His hammer is replaced by a katana, allowing him to jump {int:NinjaJump} times before touching the ground.
translation.other: 他的锤子被替换为忍者刀, 允许他在碰到地面前刀跃{int:NinjaJump}次

translation.key: The Mercenary can fly using his machine gun.
translation.value: 雇佣兵可以用手枪飞行

translation.key: He can coil explosives with his hammer and grenade that can explode to damage infected and self.
translation.value: 他可以用锤子和榴弹增加爆炸当量来产生爆炸, 可以伤害到感染者和自己.

translation.key: He can also throw poison grenades that each deal {int:NumDamagePoints} damage points during two seconds.
translation.other: 他的榴弹炮也可以发射毒气炸弹,在两秒内每秒对感染者造成{int:NumDamagePoints}点伤害

translation.key: The Sniper can lock his position in air for 15 seconds with his hammer.
translation.value: 狙击手可以用锤子固定在空中15秒.

translation.key: He can jump two times in air.
translation.value: 他可以在空中跳跃两次.

translation.key: He has also a powerful rifle that deals 30 damage points in locked position, and 10–13 otherwise.
translation.value: 他拥有超棒的激光枪在固定时可以造成高达30点的伤害, 其他情况只能造成10~13点伤害.

translation.key: The Joker can kill zombies with his hammer.then heal self 3 health.
translation.value: 小丑可以用锤子杀死感染者,并治疗自己3点血量.

translation.key: He can jump very high, and his gravity is low.
translation.value: 他可以跳得很高并且他受到的重力较低.

translation.key:
His hook lenth is 20 block.And he can take 3 damage points per 3 seconds by hooking infected,
 and heal self 2 health.
translation.value: 他的钩子有20格距离.并且可以通过钩住感染对感染每3秒造成3点伤害,并对自己治疗2格血.

translation.key: His aura can speed up the recovery speed of humans' bullet.
translation.value: 他的光环可以加快人类的子弹恢复速度.

translation.key: The Aura can give humans +1 health or armor per {sec:Time}.
translation.value: 光环可以每{sec:Time}给人类+1血量或者盾牌.

translation.key: The Smoker can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 吸烟者可以用锤子感染人类或者治愈感染者.

translation.key: He can also inflict {int:DamagePoints} damage points per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: 他可以用钩子每秒对人类造成 {int:DamagePoints} 点伤害

translation.key: The Boomer explodes when he attacks.
translation.value: 爆炸者可以在他攻击时产生爆炸.

translation.key: All humans affected by the explosion become infected.
translation.value: 人类在被炸到的时候会被感染.

translation.key: He can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: 他的钩子每秒对人类造成1点伤害

translation.key: The Hunter can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 猎人可以用锤子感染人类或者治愈感染者.

translation.key: He has tripple jump.
translation.value: 他拥有三段跳.

translation.key: The Bat can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 蝙蝠可以用锤子感染人类或者治愈感染者.

translation.key: He can jump infinitely.
translation.value: 他可以无限跳.

translation.key: The Ghost can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 幽灵可以用锤子感染人类或者治愈感染者.

translation.key: He is invisible, except if a human is near him, if he takes damage or if he uses his hammer.
translation.value: 他是隐形的, 除非有人类靠近他或者他对人造成伤害或者在使用锤子.

translation.key: The Spider can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 蜘蛛可以用锤子感染人类或者治愈感染者.

translation.key: When selecting any gun, his hook enters web mode.
translation.value: 鼠标滚轮可以切换钩子的模式.

translation.key: Any human that touches a hook in web mode is automatically grabbed.
translation.value: 任何人类在网状模式碰到它的钩子都会被捕捉.

translation.key: The Ghoul can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 食尸鬼可以用锤子感染人类或者治愈感染者.

translation.key: He can devour all that has died close to him, which makes him stronger, faster and more resistant.
translation.value: 他可以通过吸收死亡的tee的营养来使他更强壮.

translation.key: Thereupon he digests his fodder bit by bit going back to his normal state, and besides, death bereaves him of his nourishment.
translation.value: 他会不断消耗营养值直到空, 如果他死了, 会损失部分营养.

translation.key: The Slug can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 鼻涕虫可以用锤子感染人类或者治愈感染者.

translation.key: He can make the ground and walls toxic by spreading slime with his hammer.
translation.value: 他可以在地上或者墙上用锤子涂抹粘液.

translation.key: Touching the slime inflicts three damage points in three seconds on a human.
translation.value: 人类接触粘液会在3秒内造成3点伤害.

translation.key: The Slime can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 粘液可以用锤子感染人类或者治愈感染者.

translation.key: He can make slime entity by his hammer.
translation.value: 他可以使用锤子来抛掷粘液

translation.key: The Voodoo can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 巫毒者可以用锤子感染人类或者治愈感染者.

translation.key: He does not die immediately when killed but instead enters Spirit mode and defies death for a brief span of time.
translation.value: 他死后不会立刻死亡,而是会存在一段时间.

translation.key: While in Spirit mode he cannot be killed. When his time is up he finally dies.
translation.value: 他死后的那段时间不能被击杀, 只有时间到了他才会真正的死亡.

translation.key: Receive it by killing at least {int:NumKills} zombies as scientist.
translation.value: 科学家要至少击杀{int:NumKills}只僵尸才能获得白洞.

translation.key: Use it with your laser rifle, the indicator around your Tee will show you if it is available
translation.value: 需要用激光来发射它, 当它可以被建立时会有指示光点环绕在tee的周围.

translation.key: Puts humans (if enabled) and zombies into a vulnerable state by pulling them into its center
translation.value: 默认情况下,白洞不会吸引人类,只会吸引感染者到白洞的中心.

translation.key: The Undead can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 不死族可以用锤子感染人类或治愈感染者

translation.key: Instead of dying, he freezes for 10 seconds.
translation.value: 他不会死,而是被冻结10秒.

translation.key: If an infected heals him, the freeze effect disappears.
translation.value: 如果有感染治疗了他,冻结效果会消失.

translation.key: The Witch can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 女巫可以用锤子感染人类或治愈感染者.

translation.key: When an infected dies, it may respawn near the Witch.
translation.value: 当一个感染者死了,他有概率出生在女巫旁边.

translation.key: If the Witch dies, she disappears and is replaced by another class of infected.
translation.value: 如果女巫死了, 她会直接变成另一种感染职业

translation.key: She can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: 她的钩子每秒对人类造成1点伤害.

translation.key: The Freezer can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 冷冻者可以用锤子感染人类或治愈感染者.

translation.key: He can use freeze mine with his hammer.
translation.value: 他可以用锤子放置冷冻地雷.

translation.key: The freeze mine can freeze humans.
translation.value: 冷冻地雷可以冻结人类.

translation.key: If some humans in its radius. Humans will be freeze
translation.value: 如果有人类在它的半径之内, 人类会被冻结.

translation.key: Kill {int:Num} humans can found a freezer mine.
translation.value: 杀死{int:Num}个人类可以获得冷冻地雷.

translation.key: If the Freezer dies, he disappears and is replaced by another class of infected.
translation.value: 如果冷冻者死了, 他会直接变成另一种感染职业

translation.key: He can also inflict {int:Damage} damage point per second by hooking slowly humans.
translation.value: 他的钩子每秒对减速的人类造成{int:Damage}点伤害.

translation.key: The Nightmare can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 梦魇可以用锤子感染人类或治愈感染者.

translation.key: If he is invisible. and a human is near him.
translation.value: 如果他处于隐身, 并且有人类靠近了他.

translation.key: He is visible. The human will in 3 sec nightmare
translation.value: 他会现形. 人类会陷入3秒梦魇状态.

translation.key: If humans in nightmare, he can't see any entity else him.
translation.value: 如果人类陷入梦魇状态, 他就不能看到除了自己之外的任何实体.

translation.key: The Nightmare's Hook lenth is 15 blocks, and his gravity is very low.
translation.value: 梦魇的钩子长度为15格, 他受到的重力也很低.

translation.key: He can also inflict {int:Damage} damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: 他的钩子每秒对人类造成{int:Damage}点伤害.

translation.key: Targeted chat messages
translation.value: 针对性聊天

translation.key: Use “/msg <PlayerName> <My Message>” to send a private message to this player.
translation.value: 使用“/msg <玩家名> <你的消息>”发送一条私聊消息给这名玩家

translation.key: Use “/msg !<ClassName> <My Message>” to send a private message to all players with a specific class.
translation.value: 使用“/msg !<职业名> <你的消息>”发送一条消息给所有该职业玩家

translation.key: Example: “/msg !medic I'm wounded!”
translation.value: 例子: “/msg !medic 我受伤了!”

translation.key: Use “/msg !near” to send a private message to all players near you.
translation.value: 使用“/msg !near”给附近所有玩家发送消息.

translation.key: Choose a help page with /help <page>
translation.value: 使用 /help <页面名> 来选择帮助页面

translation.key: Available help pages: {str:PageList}
translation.value: 可用的帮助页面:{str:PageList}

translation.key: A random class will be automatically attributed to you when rounds start
translation.value: 在回合开始时,将自动为你选择随机职业

translation.key: The class selector will be displayed when rounds start
translation.value: 在回合开始时,将显示职业选择器

translation.key: Unknown language
translation.value: 未知语言

translation.key: Available languages: {str:ListOfLanguage}
translation.value: 可用语言: {str:ListOfLanguage}

translation.key: List of commands
translation.value: 命令列表

translation.key: Press <F3> to enable or disable hook protection
translation.value: 按下 <F3> 来启用或禁用钩索保护

translation.key: You have held a bonus area for one minute, +5 points
translation.value: 你在奖励区域已经停留1分钟, +5分

translation.key: You are frozen: {sec:EffectDuration}
translation.value: 你被冻结了: {sec:EffectDuration}

translation.key: Random choice
translation.value: 随机选择

translation.key: Choose your class
translation.value: 选择你的职业

translation.key: Laser wall: {sec:RemainingTime}
translation.value: 激光墙: {sec:RemainingTime}

translation.key: Looper laser wall: {sec:RemainingTime}
translation.value: 循环者激光墙: {sec:RemainingTime}

translation.key: {int:NumBombs} bombs left
{int:NumMines} mines are active
Mine activated
translation.value: 地雷已激活

translation.key: Next target in {sec:RemainingTime}
translation.value: 下一个目标在 {sec:RemainingTime} 后

translation.key: Target to eliminate: {str:PlayerName}
translation.value: 刺杀目标: {str:PlayerName}

translation.key: Position lock: {sec:RemainingTime}
translation.value: 固定时间还剩: {sec:RemainingTime}

translation.key: Explosive yield: {percent:BombLevel}
translation.value: 爆炸当量: {percent:BombLevel}

translation.key: Next flag in {sec:RemainingTime}
translation.value: 下一个旗子在 {sec:RemainingTime} 后

translation.key: Web mode enabled
translation.value: 网状模式开启

translation.key: Stomach filled by {percent:FodderInStomach}
translation.value: 营养值填充量: {percent:FodderInStomach}

translation.key: The witch is dead
translation.value: 女巫死了

translation.key: The freezer is dead
translation.value: 冷冻者死了

translation.key: The undead is finally dead
translation.value: 不死族最终还是死了

translation.key: Sword velocity increased
translation.value: 剑速度加快

translation.key: Sword strength increased
translation.value: 剑力量加强

translation.key: Grenade limit increased
translation.value: 冻结弹上限增加

translation.key: Type “/help {str:ClassName}” for more information about your class
translation.value: 输入 “/help {str:ClassName}” 来查询当前职业的更多信息

translation.key: The Hero found the flag!
translation.value: 英雄找到了旗帜！

translation.key: You are slowed: {sec:EffectDuration}
translation.value: 你变慢了,剩余时间: {sec:EffectDuration}

translation.key: You are in nightmare: {sec:EffectDuration}
translation.value: 你处于梦魇之中,剩余时间: {sec:EffectDuration}

translation.key: Anti-AirMine is active
translation.value: 防空地雷已经激活

translation.key: Funround are start! Zombies are {str:Zombie}. Humans are {str:Human}
translation.value: 有趣的一轮开始了! 僵尸是{str:Zombie}。人类是{str:Human}

translation.key: {str:PlayerName} is calling for Witch! ({int:NumCallers}/{int:NumCallersLimit}) To call witch write: /witch
translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 想要召唤女巫! ({int:NumCallers}/{int:NumCallersLimit}) 要召唤女巫输入: /witch

translation.key: Witch ({int:NumCallers}/{int:NumCallersLimit})
translation.value: 召唤女巫 ({int:NumCallers}/{int:NumCallersLimit})

translation.key: You can't call witch twice
translation.value: 你不能再次召唤女巫

translation.key: Witch {str:PlayerName} has arrived!
translation.value: 女巫 {str:PlayerName} 已经到达!

translation.key: White hole
translation.value: 白洞

translation.key: white hole ready, your laser rifle now disrupts space time
translation.value: 白洞就绪, 使用你的激光枪来放置它

translation.key: white hole found, adjusting scientific parameters...
translation.value: 已经建立白洞, 正在调整你的科学参数...

translation.key: WhiteHole ready !
translation.value: 白洞已经就绪!

translation.key: White hole: {sec:RemainingTime}
translation.value: 白洞剩余时间: {sec:RemainingTime}

translation.key:
{int:NumMines} mines are active
White hole: {sec:RemainingTime}
translation.value:
当前激活地雷 {int:NumMines} 个
白洞剩余时间: {sec:RemainingTime}

translation.key: elastic hole ready, your grenade now disrupts space time
translation.value: 弹射洞就绪, 使用你的榴弹炮来放置它

translation.key: elastic hole found, finding the exit passageway!
translation.value: 已经建立弹射洞, 正在获取安全通道!

translation.key: ElasticHole ready !
translation.value: 弹射洞就绪!

translation.key: Elastic hole: {sec:RemainingTime}
translation.value: 弹射洞剩余时间: {sec:RemainingTime}

translation.key:
Anti-AirMine is active
Elastic hole: {sec:RemainingTime}
translation.value:
防空地雷已激活
弹射洞剩余时间: {sec:RemainingTime}

translation.key: heal boom ready, your laser rifle now disrupts space time
translation.value: 治愈爆炸就绪, 使用你的激光枪来放置它

translation.key: heal boom found, heal them...
translation.value: 已经取得治愈爆炸, 治疗它们...

translation.key: Heal boom ready !
translation.value: 治愈爆炸就绪!

translation.key: Heal Boom: {sec:RemainingTime}
translation.value: 治愈爆炸剩余时间: {sec:RemainingTime}

translation.key: you had a freeze mine...
translation.value: 你获得了一个冻结地雷...

translation.key: stun grenades found...
translation.value: 已经获得震爆弹...

translation.key: Use hammer to switch shield mode
translation.value: 使用锤子来切换盾牌模式

translation.key: Explode
translation.value: 爆炸

translation.key: Defend
translation.value: 防御

translation.key: Your shield mode is: {str:Mode}
translation.value: 你的盾牌模式为: {str:Mode}

translation.key: Slime entity is ready!
translation.value: 粘液体已经就绪!
